member.name: M:GabrielLibrary.Filter.Blur(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Int32)
member.summary: Applies a blur effect to the image
member.param: The bitmap you want to apply the effect to
How strong you want the blur effect to be, the larger the blurrier

member.name: M:GabrielLibrary.Filter.Grains(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Int32)

The strength of the grain, must be positive
